references.reason: This paper provides a foundational overview of PAC-Bayes bounds, which is the core theoretical framework of the main paper.

references.paper_title: PAC-Bayesian supervised classification: The thermodynamics of statistical learning
references.reason: Catoni's work establishes a key PAC-Bayes bound used extensively in the methodology and analysis presented in the main paper.
This paper is highly influential in demonstrating the practical application of PAC-Bayes bounds to machine learning algorithms.
This paper contributes to the theoretical foundation of ensemble methods within the PAC-Bayes framework, relevant to the main paper's iterative approach.
McAllester's seminal work introduces the PAC-Bayesian framework, which serves as the fundamental basis for the research presented in the main paper.
